name: Pratyasha Kalita
about: I am currently a Software Engineer at Amazon. I did my undergrad from IIT Kharagpur. I like solving Algorithmic and Mathematical challenges.

experience.title: Software Engineer
experience.description: Part of the Payments Services team, responsible for delivering secure containerized, network, andmonitoring infrastructure on native AWS within the Amazon Global Payments Technology ecosystem and enabling privileged internal users to securely access raw payment instruments in compliance with regulatory requirements.
